mapper.insert: insert into comments(answer_id, user_id, is_anonymous, content, created_at, deleted_at) values (#{answerId}, #{userId}, #{isAnonymous}, #{content}, #{createdAt}, #{deletedAt});
mapper.select: select c.id, c.answer_id, c.user_id, c.is_anonymous, u.nickname, c.content, c.created_at from comments as c left join users as u on c.user_id = u.id where c.answer_id = #{answerId} and c.deleted_at IS NULL;
